articles.author: Nikhil Agarwal
articles.title: BAT sells 3.5% stake in ITC via Rs 17,500-crore block deal; stock surges over 8% - The Economic Times
articles.description: British American Tobacco sold a 3.5% stake in ITC, reducing its shareholding. Proceeds will be used for share buyback. ITC's stock price rose on the news. Goldman Sachs maintains buy rating, while CLSA upgrades ITC to buy.
articles.content: London's British American Tobacco (BAT) on Wednesday likely sold a 3.5% stake in FMCG major ITC at an average selling price of Rs 404.40 per share in block deals to institutional investors. The stake… [+3068 chars]
